30.movie_plot: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

103.movie_plot: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute.

152.movie_plot: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.

86.movie_plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

48.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)

314.movie_plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

258.movie_plot: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

31.movie_plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

192.movie_plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

47.movie_name: Man in the Iron Mask, The (1998)

279.movie_plot: A suicidally disillusioned liberal politician puts a contract out on himself and takes the opportunity to be bluntly honest with his voters by affecting the rhythms and speech of hip-hop music and culture.

33.movie_plot: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

123.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

5.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

266.movie_plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

126.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)

100.movie_plot: An exploration of how completely different the television series is from the film. The cast and filmmakers underwent quite a change in order to create the film X Files, The (1998). We are ...

222.movie_plot: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

52.movie_plot: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

25.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)

95.movie_name: Bridge on the River Kwai, The (1957)

281.movie_plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

159.movie_name: Life Is Beautiful (La Vita è bella) (1997)
159.movie_plot: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

32.movie_plot: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?

205.movie_plot: The staff of an army hospital in the Korean war find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

182.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

267.movie_plot: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss.

310.movie_plot: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

271.movie_plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

244.movie_plot: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

89.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

260.movie_plot: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

218.movie_plot: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

242.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

71.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

315.movie_plot: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, a new Ghostface begins to terrorize them once again.

240.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
240.movie_plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

116.movie_plot: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

188.movie_plot: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

166.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

272.movie_plot: Planet Spaceballs' President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.
